price: Ẹ̀mí kọ̀ọ̀kan yóò wá pẹ̀lú olùdarí kan àti ẹlẹ́rìí kan (nínú àwọn mọlāika).
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
